name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LazyLogger: Your Browsing, Now a Work Log

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: From Chrome tabs to work logs, no effort required!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LazyLogger is a tool that automatically converts your Chrome browsing history into a smart work log.

Key Features:
• Automatically converts browsing history into a work log for selected time periods
• Clean, time-organized format
• Quick clipboard copy functionality
• Customizable prompt to tailor the log format and content to your needs

How to Use:
1. Select date and time range
2. Enter preferred language
3. Click Generate Log
4. Review your generated work log
5. Copy to clipboard with a single click

Stop wasting time writing daily work logs. Let LazyLogger transform your browsing history into a smart work log.

* Share your thoughts with us!
We're making updates based on your feedback.
